headline: Terrestrial Energy: Nuclear Disruptor Positioned for Bull Run – Initiation Report
summary: Download the Complete Report Here By Brandon Hornback Talk about a white-hot opportunity. This advanced nuclear-technology play targets a $1.4 trillion serviceable market between industrial heat, data center/AI energy needs and coal plant repowering optionality. headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights GE Vernova, Constellation Energy and Montauk Renewables
summary: GE Vernova, Constellation Energy and Montauk Renewables stand out as wind and EV growth surge despite rising tariffs and tax credit risks.

headline: Does GE Vernova (GEV)ʼs Expanding Gas Turbine Backlog Quietly Redefine Its Long-Term Power Strategy?
summary: In early February 2026, Maxim Power Corp. announced it had reserved a GE Vernova 7HA.02 gas turbine manufacturing slot for its 400 MW Prairie Lights Power project in Alberta, while GE Vernova also secured large U.S. wind repowering orders, a broad alliance with Xcel Energy, multiple long-dated bond issues, and completed a major UK gas plant upgrade. Together, these moves highlight how GE Vernova is locking in future gas turbine and grid-related work while simultaneously reinforcing its...
